xldoc.title: Quine on Carnap and Analyticity
xldoc.description: An analysis of Quine's writings bearing on Carnap, analyticity and related matteres.
xldoc.keywords: philosophy logic history Carnap Quine analytic truth convention

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: Quine on Carnap, the analytic/synthetic dichotomy and related matters, including truth by convention, modality and reference, semantics and ontology. A survey and analysis of Quine's writings on Carnap's philosophy, the analytic/synthetic distinction and closely related issues.
